definition: to search for sth/to seek/to quest/to explore
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: You everywhere rush about, difficult seeking, discontentedly in present situation.
sentences.chinese: 你到處奔波，艱苦求索，不滿於現狀。

sentences.english: Way streched endless ahead, I will from head to foot.
sentences.chinese: 路漫漫其修遠兮，我將上下而求索。

sentences.english: Seeking the natural disposition of mind becomes the highest level of intelligence for several millenniums during the civilization of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 對心靈本性的求索，成爲幾千年人類文明的最高智慧。

sentences.english: Life's long road, to seek, at heart, a sincere desire to live.
sentences.chinese: 漫漫人生路，上下求索，心中渴望真誠的生活。

sentences.english: Such an undertaking appears to stand in contradiction with the graces of lowliness and humility.
sentences.chinese: 這種求索，似乎同謙虛和謙虛的美德正相違反。

sentences.english: France is pursuing the same path, as is Canada.
sentences.chinese: 法國以及加拿大都正在類似的路途中求索。
這個答案，我依舊在求索。

sentences.english: As long as the heart is the distance, Jiang Sheng quest will certainly reach the other side of hope.
sentences.chinese: 只要心向遠方，求索的槳聲就一定會到達希望的彼岸。

sentences.english: No matter how great their desires, they ask them from Allah.
sentences.chinese: 無論他們的願望有多麼強烈，他們只向安拉求索。

definition: to seek/to pursue/to investigate
diligent and tireless (idiom)
whetstone/(fig.) to hone/to temper/to encourage
anxious to learn/keen for knowledge
diligently
to advance bravely/to endeavor
sailing on the sea of learning (idiom)
to pursue/to track down/to search
to lurk under water/to immerse oneself in (study etc)/to lie low/to keep a low profile/quiet/reserved/self-possessed
long journey/trek/course of an expedition
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
sea of learning/erudite/knowledgeable person/scholarship
lit. to comb one's hair in the wind and wash it in the rain (idiom)/fig. to work in the open regardless of the weather
to make a living by writing/to write (as an author)
assiduously
see 百折不撓|百折不挠[bai3 zhe2 bu4 nao2]
